ast.name: BreakIt!
ast.comment: It's not a real dev platform unless there's a BreakOut clone... :-)

YbZw5HSgNVyx3kh2OwbR8Xaz.text: Updating the board mid-loop let's the app flash a tiny animation change to the user before the board has a chance to redraw again.
